thread.title: WOW Air adds 2 more $99 flights from BWI to European destinations
thread.title_full: WOW Air adds 2 more $99 flights from BWI to European destinations

author: Sarah Meehan
title: WOW Air adds 2 more $99 flights from BWI to European destinations
text:
WOW Air adds 2 more $99 flights from BWI to European destinations Jul 15, 2015, 10:39am EDT Share Sarah Meehan Reporter Baltimore Business Journal Bizspace Spotlight Jaclyn Borowski Skuli Mogensen, CEO of WOW Air, wants to expand the carrier's international service fromâ€¦ more The low-cost Icelandic airline WOW Air is expanding its portfolio of $99 transatlantic flights from Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport , adding trips to Paris and Amsterdam. WOW Air will fly from BWI to Paris five times per week, and to Amsterdam twice a week with flights routed through Reykjavik. Connection times are as low as 70 minutes, according to the airline. The earliest $99 one-way flight to Amsterdam the Business Journal found was Oct. 1, with $99 flights to Paris as early as Oct. 4. WOW Air launched service from BWI May 8, beginning with flights to Reykjavik. The airline has added connecting flights to other European cities, and recently began offering $99 one-way trips to Dublin . CEO Skuli Mogensen said during a May visit to BWI that he hopes to grow the airline's international service to the Baltimore airport.
